videos.name: Summer Opening 2012 First Talk
videos.descriptions: Some Description about Thich Nhat Hanh's first talk in the summer of 2012 which he opened this talk with.

videos.name: Video 2 Mindfulness
videos.descriptions: Another description that explains the content very well and makes you want to practice Mindfulness.

videos.descriptions: Things about Meditation from the teach Sister Chan Kong that helps you meditate very well.
